tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Mitt Romney Acceptance Speech at the Republican National Convention (C-SPAN) - Full Speech
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Mitt Romney accepts the Republican Presidential nomination at the 2012 Republican National Convention in Tampa Bay Times Forum. From C-SPAN's LIVE gavel-to-gavel coverage. www.c-span.org

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: The Democrats are a war party﻿ too
The Idiots﻿ are taking over ?
Paulbots & Obummadumbs﻿ please go back to your ratholes !

Every president has done something that disgraces America's image (Clinton's scandal, Bush's unethical allowance of torture, Obama assassinating Bin Laden without a trial) but what does that have to do with the fact that Romney wants to increase defense spending and send more troops to the middle east? The fact that Obama went without congress's approval wasn't relevant to Romney's stance﻿ and the fact that your assertion that liberals are the cause of intervention and foreign aid isn't true.

I﻿ have a question for Democrats- How come,since 1969, everytime a democrat gets the whitehouse, an Islamist government comes to power somewhere on the planet?Actually thats not fair to clinton so he gets a pass.But under Jimmy Carter's watch we get an Islamist Iran.Under Obama we get and Islamist Egypt, Tunisia and Libya.Cmon you gotta admit its a startling point right?

卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐卐﻿
The REAL reason they're all cheering is because he's white. ﻿

Justice = wealth. Equal opportunity (Romney wants to cut public education funding & eliminate estate taxes, cementing the class divide & eliminating any chance of equal opportunity) allows only the best to reach the top as it should. Public safety (he wants to cut funding to police depts) is an urgent imperative. Environmental rules (he wants to﻿ remove them) prevent suffering to future generations. Romney's ONLY priority is him & his rich buddies getting richer even if everyone else must suffer.
RON PAUL RON PAUL RON PAUL!!!!!!!!!!!!﻿

Reviewer.Books: Stephen Sears: To the Gates of Richmond and Chancellorsville. Howard Zinn: People's History of the United States and Hustler.
Reviewer.Hometown: Born in Virginia, live in Washington State
Reviewer.Movies: Clint Eastwood movies, The Pacific, Talladegga Nights, Training Day, The Longest Day, The Tudors, Spartacus: Blood and Sand/Gods of the Arena, The Sopranos, Boardwalk Empire, The Walking Dead, Terminator 2, Grease, Pete's Dragon, Saving Private Ryan, The Exorcist, Reservoir Dogs, Step Brothers, Friends with Benefits, National Lampoon's Vacation. I am pretty all over the place if you haven't caught the drift.
Reviewer.Music: All kinds. JOHNNY CASH!!!!!, The Gorrillaz, Red Hot Chili Peppers, The Clash. I like Rock, Reggae, some Rap, Love Hip Hop(RUN DMC, Zapp and Roger), Classical, Opera, some Tejano music is cool, Like Selena-the one that passed away in I think 1995 :'( - I like some Metal like Maiden. And Justin Timberlake has an amazing falsetto. he's probably my favorite singer.
